AppenderInfo.AppenderDesc: The forwarding appender allows a set of constraints to be used to decorate an appender.\r\nThis appender is used only in special circumstances.

Argument.Name: Threshold
Argument.Description: Which above level of information you want to log.

Argument.Name: appender-ref
Argument.Description: This means that an event directed to the specified appender directly will be logged regardless of its level, but an event directed to the ForwardingAppender will only be passed on to the specified appender if its level is which you choose or higher.
